description: This file defines types and functions for managing a shopping cart in an e-commerce frontend, including fetching cart data, adding/removing items, updating item quantities, clearing the cart, and creating checkout sessions.

methods.name: export async function getCart(token: string) { getCart
methods.description: Fetches the current shopping cart using an authorization token.

methods.name: export async function addToCart(token: string, productId: string, qty: number = 1) { addToCart
methods.description: Adds an item to the cart with specified quantity.

methods.name: export async function updateCartItem(token: string, productId: string, qty: number) { updateCartItem
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific cart item.

methods.name: export async function removeCartItem(token: string, productId: string) { removeCartItem
methods.description: Removes an item from the cart.

methods.name: export async function clearCart(token: string) { clearCart
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.

methods.name: export async function getTotals(token: string) { getTotals
methods.description: Retrieves the current subtotal, tax, and total of the cart.

methods.name: export async function createCheckoutSession(token: string) { createCheckoutSession
methods.description: Initiates a checkout process and returns a session ID and URL.

methods.name: export async function checkoutSuccess(token: string, sessionId: string) { checkoutSuccess
methods.description: Confirms a successful checkout using session ID.

ctags.name: addToCart
ctags.pattern: /^export async function addToCart(token: string, productId: string, qty: number = 1) {$/

ctags.name: checkoutSuccess
ctags.pattern: /^export async function checkoutSuccess(token: string, sessionId: string) {$/

ctags.name: removeCartItem
ctags.pattern: /^export async function removeCartItem(token: string, productId: string) {$/

ctags.name: updateCartItem
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateCartItem(token: string, productId: string, qty: number) {$/
